nav.div: Clinton School District » District » Coronavirus (COVID-19) Info and Updates » COVID-19 Grading Policies

div.div:
The purpose of grading at all times, is feedback. This feedback gives information to the student to know how they are learning and to the teacher to drive instruction. This underlying purpose will continue even during our crisis learning that has changed the learning process for everyone.
Throughout our COVID-19 school closure, each building will follow the guidelines and policies found below when it comes to grading and providing feedback for students.
If you should have any questions regarding these policies, please contact your child's school principal.
Clinton Early Childhood Center
Henry Elementary School
Clinton Intermediate School
Clinton Middle School
Clinton High School
Clinton Technical School
